Interface Builder

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteBuilder
public interface Builder
The Builder interface defines methods for constructing parts of a product.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    buildPartA(String type, String color, int size)
    Builds a primitive part (e.g., line) and adds it to the product.
    void
    buildPartC(String type, int size)
    Builds a composite part (e.g., rectangle or triangle) and adds it to the product.
    Product
    getResult()
    Returns the final product.

  • Method Details

    • buildPartA

      void buildPartA(String type, String color, int size)
      Builds a primitive part (e.g., line) and adds it to the product.
      Parameters:
      type - the part type (e.g., "Line")
      color - the color of the part
      size - the size of the part

    • buildPartC

      void buildPartC(String type, int size)
      Builds a composite part (e.g., rectangle or triangle) and adds it to the product.
      Parameters:
      type - the part type (e.g., "Rectangle")
      size - the size of the part

    • getResult

      Product getResult()
      Returns the final product.
      Returns:
      the constructed product
